content.description: Sit start low on decent holds, stand up tall to pocket. Follow crimps up to a left hand gaston sloper or pinch it. Committing move up right to a good crimp sends you to the top
content.protection: a couple of pads and a good spotter, preferably 2
content.location: North west corner of Shady Side North boulder

content.description: Start low under "volume," work out all the way left to top out on the left face of the boulder
content.location: Back/top side of Cafe Late boulder

content.description: Start low under the "volume," work out left, top out in the middle of the boulder
content.location: Back/top side of Cafe Late boulder

content.description: Start low under the "volume" and slap up the right arete
content.location: Back/top side of the Cafe Late boulder

content.description: Start matched on sloper rail, go up the center prow of the boulder
content.location: Certainly Slick boulder

content.description: Start low matched on sloper horn with a right heel out. Work up through pinches and slopes to a high crimp left, then go out right to the middle of the face. Rest up and get a good head space for the fun compression moves to the top
content.protection: 2 pads at least for the bottom, then good spotters and a prayer for the top
content.location: Porkchop Highball Boulder, Shady Side of wash, just downstream of the Shady Side North boulder

content.description: Sit start with left in a deep undercling pocket, right on a good rail, big move right up
content.location: Low center of west face of Shady Side North boulder

content.description: Stand start on good jugs, go straight up
content.location: West side of the Shady Side North boulder

content.description: Sit start with one hand in the diagonal slot and one hand on the side pull (I used a heel way out to the left to pull off the ground). Make a couple moves pinching up the arete and topout straight up.
content.location: 20' down canyon from the Cafe Late boulder

content.description: Start on the furthest left part of the jug rail in a really scrunched position without using the boulder to the left. Ride the rail to the right, big move to the lip, somewhat spicy topout. Crux is definitely pulling on. Contrived but fun.
content.location: Not sure exactly where it is in relation to the other boulders, so the route sorting might be off. It's right smack dab in the middle of the wash, 3 mins or so up canyon from the Cafe Late/Volume area.

content.description: Match on a good start hold with a low left toe chip and a high right heel. Watch the bush. Throw big out left to the arete, then follow a series of sharp crimps and powerful gastons to the good lip on top
content.location: Sunny Side of wash, down-stream of the Finding Friction boulder about 200 yards

content.description: Tricky and delicate. Start in a left hand mono pocket and right hand undercling block on bad feet, working up the sharp holds on the arete to decent holds up high for the topout.
content.protection: pads and good spot, watch for the bush
content.location: The gorgeous arete line just to the left of Cafe Late, on the Cafe Late boulder

content.description: Start matched in the rail and work left using slopers and pockets to top out on the left face of the corner. Stay low
content.protection: 2 pads and a spotter or 3 pads no spotter
content.location: In the wash

content.description: Start on sloper rail, go up through the jugs to the right
content.location: Right side of Certainly Slick boulder

content.description: Start on the lowest hands, slapping this compression up to crimps then a big move to the good lip. Trust your feet to hit the crimp rail and pull over the lip
content.location: Down-canyon about 100-150 yards of the Porkchop Highball Boulder on the Shady Side of the wash

content.description: Sit start on sloper side pull and climb straight up
content.location: Left of beedrill under watch your back

content.description: Start matched on sloper rail, working left around the corner to top out on the left face
content.location: Just down the hill from Shady Side North boulder in the riverbed

content.description: Obvious line of pockets up the face of boulder. Super fun, heady topout
content.protection: Pads and spot on the boulder on the right
content.location: Cafe Late boulder. Follow the riverbed down past the Finding Friction boulder and rusted car fenders to where the sandstone is smooth and exposed

content.description: Left hand low on the arete, right hand on the side pull. Compression moves to big throw, hit the corner and then traverse left to top out same as charcuterie
content.location: down towards the river from watch your back, on left

content.description: Sit start on decent slopers, left hand up to the arete, following a series of pockets and crimp rails to the top. Big last move off OK feet to the sloper on top.
content.protection: pads and a good spot or 2
content.location: North face of Shady Side North boulder

content.description:
Left hand low crimp/pinch, right hand high sloper, top out straight up

other boulders off
content.location: Under watch your back, in the hole
